00061 Vector3::Vector3( void ) {
00062   data_ = new real[ 3 ];
00063   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00064     data_[ i ] = 0.0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 Vector3::Vector3( const Vector3& v ) {
00068   data_ = new real[ 3 ];
00069   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00070     data_[ i ] = v.data_[ i ];
00071 }
00072 
00073 Vector3::Vector3( real x){
00074   data_ = new real[ 3 ];
00075   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00076     data_[ i ] = x;
00077 }
00078 
00079 Vector3::Vector3( real x, real y, real z ) {
00080   data_ = new real[ 3 ];
00081   data_[ 0 ] = x;
00082   data_[ 1 ] = y;
00083   data_[ 2 ] = z;
00084 }
00085 
00086 template < typename real_t > 
00087 Vector3::Vector3( const real_t* x0 ) {
00088   data_ = new real[ 3 ];
00089   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00090     data_[ i ] = x0[ i ];
00091 }
00092 
00093 Vector3::~Vector3() {
00094   delete[] data_;

00195 // dot product
00196 //inline 
00197 real 
00198 Vector3::operator*( const Vector3& vb ) const {
00199   real res = 0.0;
00200   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < 3; i++ )
00201     res += data_[ i ] * vb.data_[ i ];
00202   return res;
00203 }
00204 
00205 // cross product
00206 //inline 
00207 Vector3 
00208 Vector3::operator^( const Vector3& vb ) const {
00209   Vector3 temp;
00210 
00211   temp.data_[ 0 ] = data_[ 1 ] * vb.data_[ 2 ] - data_[ 2 ] * vb.data_[ 1 ];
00212   temp.data_[ 1 ] = data_[ 2 ] * vb.data_[ 0 ] - data_[ 0 ] * vb.data_[ 2 ];
00213   temp.data_[ 2 ] = data_[ 0 ] * vb.data_[ 1 ] - data_[ 1 ] * vb.data_[ 0 ];
00214 
00215   return temp;
00216 }

00218 //inline 
00219 real 
00220 Vector3::norm( void ) const {
00221   return sqrt( ( *this ) * ( *this ) );
00222 }
00223 
00224 //inline
00225 real 
00226 Vector3::norm2( void ) const {
00227   return ( *this ) * ( *this );
00228 }
00229 
00230 //inline 
00231 Vector3& 
00232 Vector3::normalize( void ) {
00233   if ( norm2() < 1e-10 )
00234     return *this;
00235   *this /= norm();
00236   return *this;
00237 }

00246 std::string
00247 Vector3::toString(){
00248   std::ostringstream out;
00249   for(int i=0; i<3; ++i){
00250     out << data_[i] << " ";
00251   }
00252   return out.str();
00253 }

00255 // output
00256 std::ostream& 
00257 operator<<( std::ostream& s, Vector3 v ) {
00258   s << v( 0 );
00259   for ( unsigned i = 1; i < 3 && s << " "; ++i )
00260     s << v( i );
00261   return s;
